702290f-a.title: Brooklyn: 3rd Avenue - 29th Street
702290f-a.text:
3rd Avenue, at the N.E. corner of 29th Street, showing
the corner cleared of its buildings,and the Hamarine lumber
yard. Third Avenue is being rebuilt into Brooklyn's
northerly extension of the Belt Parkway, leading to and from
the Brooklyn-Battery Tunnel.
October 18, 1940
P. L. Sperr
